content.question: Which of the following poses a threat to state sovereignty in the United Kingdom?

choices.label: A trade war with the European Union
Sanctions imposed by the United Nations
Foreign direct investment and multinational corporations

content.answer: Foreign direct investment and multinational corporations

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors of a course country.
